text: Michael Henry Tavoa"God's Gentlemen: A History of the Melanesian Mission, 1849–1942" Hilliard, D. p87: Brisbane; University of Queensland Pres; 1978 was the third Bishop of Vanuatu,Anglican News one of the nine dioceses that make up the Anglican Church of Melanesia.ACOM ==References== Category:2018 deaths Category:Anglican bishops in Oceania Category:20th-century Anglican bishops Category:Bishops of New Hebrides, Vanuatu and New Caledonia Category:Diocese of Vanuatu and New Caledonia Category:Vanuatuan Anglican priests Category:Year of birth missing
title: Michael Tavoa
